attributes.action: keep the use of electronic cigarettes indoors and in public places legal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: electronic cigarettes are helping thousands of people across the UK to stop smoking or cut down. there is no evidence to suggest that there is a danger of passive smoking as no smoke is produced. The vapor does not leave a smell of any kind. Also, electronic cigarettes may help reduce the number of closures of pubs and bars around the country.
